# The `BitIntegerState` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Specialization of the integer state for a bit-wise encoding. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename base&#95;ty = uint32&#95;t, base&#95;ty BestState = ~base&#95;ty(0), base&#95;ty WorstState = 0&gt;
struct llvm::BitIntegerState&lt;base&#95;ty, BestState, WorstState&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Specialization of the integer state for a bit-wise encoding.
